summary: Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.
cast: Emma Roberts|Kiernan Shipka|Lucy Boynton|James Remar|Lauren Holly|Greg Ellwand|Elana Krausz|Heather Tod Mitchell|Peter James Haworth|Emma Holzer|Peter J. Gray|Matthew Stefiuk|Rose Gagnon|Ronda Louis-Jeune|Cameron Preyde|Myranda Bingham|Tori Barban|Veronica Cormier|Stephen K. Donnelly|Trevor Goulet|Hallie Green|Aileigh Karson|Ilish Karson|Douglas Kidd|Jodi Larratt|Donna St-Jean|Megan Weckwerth|Katelyn Wells
title: La enviada del mal
